Hey everyone,

Permission to post taken from @jarland

Cloudrino is proud to announce addition of 2 new nodes - Pune, India and Melbourne, Australia. 

Here is the Low End Offer:

1 GB RAM

20 GB SSD

500 GB Bandwidth(50Mbit)

1 core

1 IPv4 

Location: North Carolina / India / Australia

Price: $5/month

Signup Here:
https://www.cloudrino.net/signup/

Test IP India: 43.228.236.1

Test IP Australia: 103.26.204.3

Test IP USA: 150.107.224.1

Disallowed - Game Servers, Adult Content, Torrents.

Looking forward to having you guys on board soon.

Cheers!
